short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser extension enhancing NEPSE TMS and Meroshare with live updates, login management, and auto-fill for better UX.

## Important Disclaimer âš ï¸
This extension is NOT affiliated with, endorsed by, or connected to NEPSE, TMS, or MeroShare/CDSC. This is an independent, open-source tool created for educational purposes.

## FAQ â“

Q: Is my data secure?
A: Yes! All credentials are stored locally on your device. No data is transmitted to external servers.

Q: Does it work on all websites?
A: No, it only works on official TMS portals and MeroShare website.

Q: Is it free?
A: Yes, completely free and open source.

Q: How does it handle multiple accounts?
A: You can set primary accounts per broker for TMS and one primary account for MeroShare.

Q: I faced issue with extension, it is not loading data.
A: In such case please kindly read the extension from browser extensions page.
